Question: What important feature of the Watson NLU API do we have to ensure so that we can repeat an experiment in the future in a reproducible way?
Answer: Passing a version argument with each request
Each future version of the API is guaranteed to keep the same arguments
The NLU can be run locally
The exchanged JSON is guaranteed to keep the same format
Correct: Passing a version argument with each request
